expo.name: MyFirstProject
expo.description:
This my Comp3130 mobile applications Assignment. The purpose of this project was to develop a travel application that can display data to the user.


Furthermore, while this application does have a working register page, which can be used to login into the application the credentials provided below is a preconfigured account with a premade Wishlist and personal profile picture attached.
